item.title: tmux
item.description: tmux Installing macOS 1 brew install tmux Commands tmux ls 1 tmux ls returns list of active tmux sessions Default key bindings Default prefix key 1 ctrl(control) + b Panes default key bindings Split the window horizontally (Horizontal pane)
